text: I’m looking forward to returning to school.
You know, I think you’re right. The professors didn’t have much say in how things ended up this quarter. So long as the workload they give us is reasonable, I think I may tip higher too.

I see your point, but I wouldn’t want to crowd out their intrinsic motivation. Some of the magic is lost when the professor knows what they’ll be tipped—they have no incentive to go above and beyond anymore.
